title: 超级战士皮肤，超酷铁轨，部分红石工具改型，草机械化。
author: Robokill
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Robokill 于 2014-1-20 20:50 编辑 

超级战士皮肤，超酷铁轨，部分红石工具改型，草机械化，并改成蓝色了。


下载后放进.minecraft\texturepacks，file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Jeff/%E6%A1%8C%E9%9D%A2/%E8%B6%85%E7%BA%A7%E6%88%98%E5%A3%AB/%E5%9B%BE/2013-08-13_12.55.24.png就是按照按材质包一样安装就可以了。

file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Jeff/%E6%A1%8C%E9%9D%A2/minecraft146XDZZMOD/1.4.6%E7%8E%B0%E4%BB%A3%E6%88%98%E4%BA%89%EF%BC%88%E5%AE%A2%E6%88%B7%E7%AB%AF%EF%BC%89/.minecraft/screenshots/2013-08-13_12.55.24.png

谢谢各位支持。file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Jeff/%E6%A1%8C%E9%9D%A2/minecraft146XDZZMOD/1.4.6%E7%8E%B0%E4%BB%A3%E6%88%98%E4%BA%89%EF%BC%88%E5%AE%A2%E6%88%B7%E7%AB%AF%EF%BC%89/.minecraft/screenshots/2013-08-13_12.57.23.pngfile:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Jeff/%E6%A1%8C%E9%9D%A2/%E8%B6%85%E7%BA%A7%E6%88%98%E5%A3%AB/%E5%9B%BE/2013-08-13_12.55.24.png[attach]423898[/attach][attach]423897[/attach][attach]423896[/attach][attach]423895[/attach]file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Jeff/%E6%A1%8C%E9%9D%A2/%E8%B6%85%E7%BA%A7%E6%88%98%E5%A3%AB/%E5%9B%BE/2013-08-13_12.56.10.png
